actions.welcome: Feel free to explore my portfolio and reach out

summary: I'm a Fullstack Web Developer with over 3 years of experience creating dynamic, user-friendly, and scalable web applications. I'm passionate about building seamless digital experiences and solving real-world problems through clean, efficient code.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.description: Responsible for developing and maintaining internal and client-facing web applications, collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions.
responsibilities: Developed and maintained scalable web applications for internal and external use.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to implement responsive interfaces.
Integrated RESTful APIs to streamline data exchange between frontend and backend.
Optimized performance and improved loading times by implementing caching and code-splitting.

quoteOfTheDay.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Winston Churchill

quoteOfTheDay.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Steve Jobs

quoteOfTheDay.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quoteOfTheDay.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Wayne Gretzky

quoteOfTheDay.text: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Thomas Edison

quoteOfTheDay.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quoteOfTheDay.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Confucius

quoteOfTheDay.text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Steve Jobs

quoteOfTheDay.text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Alan Kay

quoteOfTheDay.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quoteOfTheDay.author: Lao Tzu

projects.title: SSGI 2024
projects.summary: A single lite project can elevate the skill of a person
projects.goals: Build a lightweight, impactful web project demonstrating full-stack proficiency.
projects.takeaways: Strengthened ability to scope, develop, and deploy solo projects with clear user value.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.summary: Built a simple but effective real-time weather application using public APIs.
projects.goals: Learn API consumption, error handling, and UI responsiveness in React.
projects.takeaways: Gained understanding of asynchronous API calls, error states, and clean UI design principles.

projects.title: E-commerce Dashboard
projects.summary: A dashboard built for small businesses to manage their online sales and inventory.
projects.goals: Provide store owners with real-time insights and order management tools.
projects.takeaways: Improved backend integration skills and UI state management in modern SPAs.
